title: Android 13 Beta 1 introduces a new toggle to help you control smart home devices on a locked phone
content:
With Android 13 DP2, Google introduced a new API to give users access to some device controls, even on locked phones. Google’s documentation for this new isAuthRequired method revealed that if it returned “true,” the associated Device Control will become available on locked phones. description: The first Android 13 Beta release brings a new toggle in the Lock screen settings that will make smart home device controls available on locked phones.
